name: urgently
content:
urgently adverb
(IMPORTANT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 in a way that needs attention very soon, especially before anything else, because of being very important: Help is urgently needed. These tasks are urgently important.
More examplesFewer examplesMore research is urgently required.Why does she need to speak to me so urgently?They must urgently develop a method for establishing partnerships with other countries.

(DETERMINED)
B1 formal in a determined way that shows you want something very much or think it is very important: "Come straight away!" she said urgently. He bent over and spoke urgently in Nicholas's ear. See
